title: Moving Average Filter
description:
FILTER_MAV_W is a flter with moving average. The flter with moving ave￾rage (also Moving Average Filter called) the average of N successive rea￾dings is output as an average. 
Y:= (X0 + X1 + … + Xn-1) / N
X0 is the value of X in the current cycle, X1 is the value in the previous cy￾cle, etc. The number of values over which the average has to be calcula￾ted is specifed at the input N. The range of values of N is between 1 and
32
name: FILTER_MAV_W

input.name: X
input.description: Input variable which is a word value to be averaged.

input.name: N
input.description: Input variable that specifies the number of samples to average. It is limited to a maximum of 32.

input.name: RST
input.description: Reset variable that initializes the moving average calculation when set to TRUE.

output.name: Y
output.description: Output variable which holds the current average value.
